Package org.slim3.datastore

Slim3 Datastore.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FilterCriterion A criterion interface for filter.
SortCriterion A criterion interface for sort.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAttributeMeta<M,A> An abstract meta data of attribute.
AbstractCriterion An abstract class for criterion.
AbstractQuery<SUB> An abstract query.
AbstractSortCriterion An abstract class for sort criterion.
AllKindAncestorQuery An ancestor query for all kind.
AscCriterion An implementation class for "ascending" sort criterion.
AttributeComparator A Comparator for attribute value.
BetweenCriterion An implementation class for "between" filter criterion.
CollectionAttributeMeta<M,A,E> A meta data of collection attribute.
ContainsCriterion An implementation class for "contains" filter criterion.
CoreAttributeMeta<M,A> A meta data of attribute.
Datastore A class to access datastore.
DescCriterion An implementation class for "descending" sort criterion.
EntityQuery A query for datastore entity.
EqualCriterion An implementation class for "equal" filter criterion.
GreaterThanCriterion An implementation class for "greater than" filter criterion.
GreaterThanOrEqualCriterion An implementation class for "greater than or equal" filter criterion.
IsNotNullCriterion An implementation class for "is not null" filter criterion.
LessThanCriterion An implementation class for "less than" filter criterion.
LessThanOrEqualCriterion An implementation class for "less than or equal" filter criterion.
ModelMeta<M> A meta data of model.
ModelQuery<M> A query class for select.
StartsWithCriterion An implementation class for "startsWith" filter criterion.
StringAttributeMeta<M> A meta data of string attribute.
 

Exception Summary
EntityNotFoundRuntimeException This exception is thrown when no entity specified by the key could be found.
 

Annotation Types Summary

Impermanent An annotation for an impermanent attribute.

PrimaryKey An annotation for key.
Text An annotation for text.
Unindexed An annotation for unindexed attribute.
Version An annotation for version.
